text:
e="preserve">Kamal Rani Varun (3 May 1958 – 2 August 2020) was an Indian politician. She was member of Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly from 2017 to 2020. She was also a member of Eleventh and Twelfth Lok Sabha between 1996 to 1999. She was born in Lucknow. Varun was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party.
On 2 August 2020, Varun died at a hospital in Lucknow at the age of 62 from COVID-19.
